message: Fair split, let's start with a clean slate!
You started with an even split, now it's time for me to get a bit more.
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but not that big!
You're being generous, but I'm not done yet!
You're really pushing it, Bob! I'm willing to give you most of the money, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
